member.summary: Provites IO methods for intervacing with a text based console.

member.summary: Outputs text to the console. Prints only a new line.

member.summary: Outputs text to the console.

String added to the end of the output.
List of any other strings to output.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.IO.Text.Console.Print(System.Object,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Outputs text versions of objects to the console.
member.param: The object to output. Must be able to be implicitly converted to a string.
String added to the end of the output.
List of any other strings to output. Must be able to be implicitly converted to a string.

member.summary: Retrives an input from the console.

member.returns: A line of input from the console as a string.

member.summary: Retrives an input from the console with a prompt message.

String to format line for input.
member.returns: A line of input from the console as a string.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.IO.Text.Console.Input(System.String,System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrives an input from the console with a prompt message. Uses a method deligate to force valid input.
member.param: Message to be printed to the display to request input.
Validator method deligate. Takes a string and returns a boolean.
Message to display if validation fails before asking for the input again.
String to format line for input.
member.returns: A line of input from the console as a string.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.IO.Text.Console.Input``1(System.String,System.Func{System.String,``0},System.String)
member.summary: Retrives an input from the console with a prompt message. Converts the input to the given type.
member.param: Message to be printed to the display to request input.
Method deligate to convert the string input to the requested type.
String to format line for input.
member.returns: A line of input from the console, coverted to the specified type.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.IO.Text.Console.Input``1(System.String,System.Func{System.String,``0},System.Func{System.Object,System.Boolean},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrives an input from the console with a prompt message. Uses a method deligate to force valid input. Converts the input to the given type (before validation)
member.param: Message to be printed to the display to request input.
Method deligate to convert the string input to the requested type.
Validator method deligate. Takes an object of the specified type and returns a boolean.
Message to display if validation fails before asking for the input again.
String to format line for input.
member.returns: A line of input from the console, coverted to the specified type.

member.summary: Allows the user to select an item from an array of options. Returns the option.

Wether or not the user's selected option will be displayed on the console.

member.name: T:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators
member.summary: Provides type and content testing methods for testing objects.

member.summary: Checks to see if the provided object can be converted to a boolean.
member.param: The object to be tested.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators.IsChar(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks to see if the provided object is a character object or a string with a single character.
member.param: The object to be tested.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators.IsString(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks to see if the provided object can be converted to a string.
member.param: The object to be tested.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators.IsAlpha(System.Char)
member.summary: Checks to see if the provided character is an alpha character.
member.param: Character to test.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators.IsAlpha(System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if the provided string contains only alpha character.
member.param: String to test.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators.IsAlpha(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks to see if the provided object is a valid character or string and contains only alpha characters.
member.param: Object to test.
member.returns: Boolean - false if not a character or string or has no conversion to one

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators.IsInt(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks to see if the provided object can be converted to an integer (int64).
member.param: The object to be tested.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators.IsDouble(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks to see if the provided object can be converted to a float.
member.param: The object to be tested.

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators.InRange(System.Object,System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tests if a number lies in the range lower (inclusive) to upper (exclusive) or outside the range if requested.
member.param: Number to be tested.
Lower boundry (inclusive).
Upper boundry (exclusive).
Specifies wether the test should be for lying inside the range (outside if false).

member.name: M:QuasarCode.Library.Tools.Validators.IsEven(System.Object)
member.summary: Tests if a given number is even. --| WARNING |-- Will ROUND floating point numbers to the nearest integer.
member.param: The number to test. Must be convertable to an integer.
